products.name: Pasta Cream
products.description: Creamy pasta perfection: Silky strands of pasta enrobed in a luscious cream sauce, delivering an irresistible combination of smoothness and flavor. Indulge in this comforting dish that will leave you craving for more.
products.ingredients: Pasta, cream, butter, garlic, Parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper.

products.name: Tomato Pasta
products.description: A vibrant medley of al dente pasta tossed with a tangy tomato sauce, creating a classic and satisfying combination. The robust flavors of ripe tomatoes and aromatic herbs meld together, providing a comforting and mouthwatering experience. A timeless favorite that brings a taste of Italy to every bite.
products.ingredients: Pasta, tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, onion, basil, salt, black pepper, Parmesan cheese.

products.name: Hamburger
products.description: Juicy grilled patties nestled in soft buns, adorned with fresh toppings for a burger experience that's hard to resist. The perfect balance of flavors and textures, each bite delivers a satisfying blend of savory meat, crisp vegetables, and tangy condiments. A classic comfort food that satisfies cravings with every delicious bite.
products.ingredients: Ground beef, hamburger buns, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, cheese, ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise, salt, black pepper.

products.name: Pancake
products.description: Fluffy and golden, these pancakes are a breakfast delight. With a light and airy texture, they melt in your mouth as you drizzle them with maple syrup. Indulge in a stack of these comforting treats that are sure to start your day with a smile.
products.ingredients: Flour, milk, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt, butter.

products.name: Pizza
products.description: Savor the perfect harmony of flavors with our mouthwatering pizza. Each slice boasts a thin, crispy crust topped with a vibrant tomato sauce, gooey melted cheese, and an array of delicious toppings. Experience the ultimate comfort food that delivers a symphony of taste in every bite.
products.ingredients: Pizza dough, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, toppings (such as pepperoni, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, olives), olive oil, garlic, salt, dried oregano, crushed red pepper flakes.

products.name: Ramen
products.description: Slurp your way to satisfaction with a bowl of piping hot ramen. Delicate noodles swim in a flavorful broth, accompanied by succulent slices of meat, vibrant vegetables, and a burst of aromatic spices. This beloved Japanese comfort food will transport your taste buds to a realm of pure umami bliss.
products.ingredients: Ramen noodles, broth (such as chicken, beef, or vegetable), soy sauce, miso paste, green onions, sliced pork or chicken, soft-boiled egg, nori (seaweed), sesame oil, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper.

products.name: Rice
products.description: Steamed to perfection, our fluffy rice serves as the ideal foundation for any meal. With its subtle aroma and delicate texture, it pairs perfectly with a variety of dishes, from savory stir-fries to hearty curries. Experience the simple yet satisfying pleasure of this versatile staple that complements any cuisine.

products.name: Salad
products.description: Fresh, crisp, and bursting with vibrant flavors, our salad is a refreshing culinary masterpiece. A colorful medley of crisp greens, juicy tomatoes, crunchy cucumbers, and zesty dressings creates a harmonious balance of textures and tastes. Embark on a healthy and invigorating journey with every delightful forkful.
products.ingredients: Lettuce (such as romaine, iceberg, or mixed greens), tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, bell peppers, red onions, olives, feta cheese, dressing (such as vinaigrette, ranch, or Caesar)

products.name: Schnitzel
products.description: Crispy on the outside, tender on the inside, our schnitzel dish is a tantalizing treat for the senses. Each succulent cutlet is coated in a golden breadcrumb crust, delivering a satisfying crunch with every bite. Indulge in this classic comfort food that promises to leave you craving for more.
products.ingredients: Chicken cutlets, flour, eggs, breadcrumbs, salt, black pepper, paprika, vegetable oil

products.name: Soup
products.description: Savor the heartwarming goodness of our soul-soothing soup. A comforting blend of flavorful broth, tender vegetables, and nourishing ingredients come together to create a bowl of pure comfort. Whether seeking warmth or a boost of nutrients, this comforting dish is a delightful choice.
products.ingredients: Broth, vegetables (carrots, celery, onions), garlic, herbs (such as thyme or parsley), protein (chicken, beef, or tofu), noodles.

products.name: Sushi
products.description: Elevate your dining experience with our sushi, a tantalizing fusion of flavors and textures. Expertly rolled and meticulously crafted, each piece showcases the finest ingredients from the sea and land. Indulge in this elegant culinary delight that celebrates the art of Japanese cuisine.
products.ingredients: Sushi rice, nori (seaweed sheets), raw fish (such as tuna, salmon, or shrimp), vegetables (such as cucumber, avocado, or carrots), soy sauce, wasabi, pickled ginger, rice vinegar, sugar, salt.

products.name: Toast
products.description: Start your day with a simple pleasure - perfectly toasted bread that's golden and crispy. Slathered with creamy butter or topped with your favorite spread, each bite brings comfort and warmth. A timeless classic that adds a touch of coziness to any morning routine.
